public class GUIShuttle
extends GuiComponent

GUIConveyorConnector is a graphical representation of the conveyer connector component connecting conveyors

Method Detail

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent ae)
Moves a GUIPart one block in a direction. Before moving a block, calls alignPart to make sure the part is squarely on the conveyor.

Specified by:

eventFired

public void eventFired(TChannel channel,
                       TEvent event,
                       java.lang.Object[] args)
Description copied from class: GuiComponent
Called every time the transducer is fired. Corresponds to an Agent command, to which the component should respond.

Specified by:
eventFired in interface TReceiver
Specified by:
eventFired in class GuiComponent
Parameters:
channel - the channel the event was fired on
event - the event type
